entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
